updates.title: OpenAI launches Atlas, a ChatGPT-powered browser that lets users surf the web using natural language, while Microsoft quickly follows with a nearly identical AI browser feature called Copilot Mode in Edge.
OpenAI acquires Sky (Software Applications, Inc.), an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view screens and take actions in apps, expanding their desktop AI capabilities.
OpenAI's Sora video generator receives major updates including AI video creation of pets and objects, new social features, video editing tools, and an upcoming Android app launch.
Instagram integrates Meta AI editing tools directly into Stories, allowing users to describe what they want to add, remove, or change in their photos using natural language prompts.
OpenAI launches new ChatGPT company knowledge feature that makes it easier to search workspace information from third-party apps without switching between platforms.
